overview_of_class: Development of economic thought and economic methodology from the advent of the mercantilists to the formation of current schools of economics. The course will focus on the evolution of economics as a body of thought, with strong emphasis the movement from classical economics to neoclassical economics as a foundation for modern economic theory. This course is intended to be a capstone to your economics major, to be taken senior year, after the completion of the major's core classes and several electives.
name: History of Economic Thought
subject: ECON
